content.en: Stochastic algorithms: Scientists have been studying the behavior of algorithms in various stochastic approximation problems. They are interested in understanding the conditions for convergence and the rates of convergence of these algorithms. The research focuses on the impact of random directions, noise sequences, and computational aspects on the performance of the algorithms.
content.da: Stokastiske algoritmer: Forskere har studeret adfærden af algoritmer i forskellige stokastiske approximationsproblemer. De er interesserede i at forstå betingelserne for konvergens og konvergenshastighederne for disse algoritmer. Forskningen fokuserer på virkningen af tilfældige retninger, støjsekvenser og beregningsmæssige aspekter på algoritmernes ydeevne.
